body:
This is an automated reply to your message "Re: [Radiance-general] Rendering large space with small detail (small
picture now attached!)" sent to chris@zed-uk.com.

Dear Paul Chilton <p.chilton@gmail.com>

Thank you for your email. I am away from the office till Friday 22nd May.  I will be receiving my emails, but may not be able to reply to them promptly. If you have an urgent query please contact my colleague Eric Roberts on 0161 3386200 or via email to eric@zed-uk.com.

Thanks

Chris
subject: Automated Reply Re: "Re: [Radiance-general] Rendering large spacewith small detail (small\n	picture now attached!)"
